name: Cube Ratio
description:
Help the cursed cube Ratio escape from the keeper of the magic stone, which Ratio "borrowed" for the sake of super strength. The very background is better to be told by Ratio himself already in the game!
Save up coins and diversify skins for the Ratio Cube!

The game has several languages, many different locations, maps, changing the cube skin Ratio.

You can play both with a donation and absolutely for free.

The game is suitable for both boys and girls

You can play without internet.
